_meanings:
To divide
or cut into parts.

_gram:
( 
{#Binatti, BiMtte, biBeda, biBide, aBEtsIt, aBidat#},
{#aBitta, Betsyati-te, BettuM, Binna#})
_meanings:
{@--2@} To
dig or tear up, excavate; <ls>U. 1. 23.</ls>

{@--8@} To change, alter; ({#na#})
{#BiMdaMti maMdAM gatimaSvapuKyaH#} <ls>Ku. 1. 11</ls>; or
{#viSvAsopagamAdaBimnagatayaH SabdaM sahaMte#} 
{#mfgAH#} <ls>Ś. 1. 14.</ls>

{@--1@} To be split, rent or
shivered; <ls>Mk. 5. 22</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 139.</ls>

{@--8@} To be harassed, pained or 
afflicted.

{@--10@} To 
separate oneself from, keep aloof from.
